short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocBuddy Voice streamlines the provider workflow by adding the productivity of voice and templates to any EMR system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocBuddy Voice streamlines the provider workflow by adding the productivity of voice and templates to any mobile or browser based medical record system.
